dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.compet.CompetitorMarketSegment
dataStructure.description:
A MarketSegment served by a Competitor.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: CompetitorMarketSegment

child.name: plannedMarketEntryDate
child.description:
The date on which a Competitor plans to offer ProductOfferings in a MarketSegment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: plannedMarketEntryDate

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period during which the CompetitorMarketSegment information is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: rank
child.description:
The degree of importance or excellence of a Competitor in a MarketSegment relative to other Competitors in the MarketSegment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: rank
